attr.title: Super Skelemania
attr.desc: Dive into Super Skelemania, a single-sitting metroidvania about an acrobatic skeleton. Jump over a pit of thorns, roll your skull like a bowling ball, or headbutt a spider like any good skeleton would!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://benal.itch.io/super-skelemania) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/730920/Super_Skelemania). For itch.io, extract the .exe as if it were a 7-zip archive (which it is) and copy all the games files into the port *gamedata* folder; for Steam, there's no need to extract the game files, just copy them to the *gamedata* folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://benal.itch.io/super-skelemania) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/730920/Super_Skelemania). For itch.io, extract the .exe as if it were a 7-zip archive (which it is) and copy all the games files into the port *gamedata* folder; for Steam, there's no need to extract the game files, just copy them to the *gamedata* folder.
